# QA Script Template (fast + reliable)

**Browsers:** Chrome + Edge
**Datasets:** small + worst-case (largest client case)

### Steps

1. Open case
2. Pan/zoom map and graph
3. Brush timeline rapidly
4. Switch saved view
5. Navigate back/forward
6. Export snapshot

### Pass conditions

- [ ] Panes stay in sync
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Interaction stays responsive (no freezes > 200ms)
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works for selection + range controls
